data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: When we talk about the differences between Earth and the other planets in our solar system, what usually comes to our mind is the eco-environment. Earth has life. This is surely something that other planets do not have. This is because of the unique eco-environment that we have on Earth. Such an environment is formed because of millions of years of evolution. And for that to happen, water and oxygen are critical. Other planets do not have these, so they are not suitable for humans to live on. Overall, there are many differences between Earth and other planets.
data.referenceText: What are the differences between Earth and the other planets in our solar system?
data.referenceTranslate: 地球和太阳系的其他行星有什么不同?
